item.title: 特朗普的 "星际之门 "项目距离富士康威斯康星州有一百万英里之遥
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将探讨名为 "星际之门"（Stargate）的人工智能基础设施提案，并指出在特朗普总统的第一个任期内，一个备受瞩目的科技项目并没有达到预期目标。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at the AI infrastructure proposal called Stargate and points out that a much-heralded tech project during President Trump’s first term in office didn’t live up to its billing.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚摊牌后，特朗普的下一个关税大限将于 2 月 1 日到来
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普出于许多不同的目的威胁要征收大量关税。周日，他宣布对哥伦比亚征收25%的关税，理由是哥伦比亚反对美国对待被驱逐出境者的做法，随后他又打了退堂鼓。【原文：Donald Trump has threatened a lot of tariffs for many different purposes. And as he demonstrated Sunday when he announced, and then backed away from, 25% tariffs on Colombia for pushing back against US treatment of deportees, he’s willing to use them for non-economic reasons.】

item.title: 加纳在通胀压力升高的情况下延长利率暂停期
item.description: 加纳中央银行连续第二次维持关键利率不变，以抵御仍然过高的通货膨胀。【原文：Ghana’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged for a second time in a row to fend off inflation, which remains too high.】

item.title: 布达佩斯市长旨在阻止欧尔班建设 "迷你迪拜 "的计划
item.description: 布达佩斯议会将于周三就一项提案展开辩论，该提案旨在停止匈牙利最大的房地产开发项目，其中可能包括建造欧盟最高的摩天大楼。【原文：The Budapest assembly will debate a proposal on Wednesday to halt Hungary’s biggest property development that may include the construction of the European Union’s highest skyscrapers.】

item.title: 泰国财政部长再次推动降息和泰铢走软
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）最新呼吁央行降低借贷成本，使泰铢 "更具竞争力"，以促进该国的主要出口和旅游业。【原文：Thailand’s Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira made his latest pitch for the central bank to cut borrowing costs and make the baht “more competitive” to boost the country’s key exports and tourism sectors.】

item.title: AT&T电话和互联网用户增长，业绩超出预期
item.description: AT&T Inc. 公布的第四季度业绩超过了华尔街的预期，其中移动电话用户和光纤互联网用户的增长好于预期，这主要得益于季节性促销和捆绑产品的推出。【原文：AT&T Inc. posted fourth-quarter results that beat Wall Street projections, including better-than expected increases in mobile-phone customers and fiber-based internet subscribers, driven by seasonal promotions and bundled product offerings.】

item.title: 小型股暴跌扩大印度股市跌势，恐惧指数创五个月新高
item.description: 周一，由于对经济放缓的担忧和不温不火的盈利打击了投资者的情绪，小型公司股价领跌国内股市。【原文：Shares of small-cap companies led the rout in the country’s broader equity market on Monday, as worries over economic slowdown and tepid earnings hurt investor sentiment.】

item.title: DeepSeek 是对收购美国大型科技公司的一次打击
item.description: 你今天早上听到的嗖嗖声是投机资金从科技股和更广泛的高风险投资中冲出的声音。【原文：That whooshing sound you’re hearing this morning is speculative money rushing out of tech stocks and risky investments more broadly.】

item.title: 伊拉克鲁迈拉油田火灾后日产量减少 30 万桶
item.description: 据一位官员称，伊拉克鲁迈拉油田上周发生火灾后，石油日产量仍减少了 30 万桶。【原文：Oil output at Iraq’s Rumaila field remains reduced by 300,000 barrels a day after a fire last week, according to an official.】

item.title: 特朗普的科技亿万富翁们在购买什么？
item.description:
在特朗普的就职典礼上，业界最有权势的人士都站在最前排，他们每个人都希望得到的不仅仅是一张参加新政府启动派对的邀请函。【原文：

The industry’s most powerful people were front and center at Trump’s inauguration, and each of them is hoping for something more than just an invitation to the kickoff party for the new administration.

】

item.title: 美联储通胀之战持续，美国工薪阶层求助于食品银行
item.description:
美国食品银行正面临着由生活成本紧缩引发的需求浪潮

。【原文：

US food banks are facing a wave of need driven by the cost-of-living crunch

】

item.title: CVC 向 PureHealth 出售价值 23 亿美元的医院集团股份
item.description: 阿布扎比的 PureHealth Holding PJSC 公司将从 CVC Capital Partners 手中收购一家希腊连锁医院的多数股权，这将进一步推动阿布扎比酋长国向医疗行业扩张，并使其经济摆脱石油而实现多元化。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s PureHealth Holding PJSC is buying a majority stake in a Greek hospital chain from CVC Capital Partners, bolstering the emirate’s efforts to expand into the sector and diversify its economy away from oil.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦降低利率以刺激经济需求
item.description: 巴基斯坦连续第六次下调基准利率，因为通胀降温为决策者提供了促进经济增长的空间。【原文：Pakistan cut its benchmark interest rate for the sixth straight meeting as cooling inflation provides space for policymakers to bolster growth.】

item.title: 印度 JSW 赢得矿山合同后进军铜矿业务
item.description: JSW 集团赢得了印度东部恰尔肯德邦（Jharkhand）国有印度斯坦铜业有限公司（Hindustan Copper Ltd.）两个铜矿区块的竞标，将其业务扩展到有色金属开采领域。【原文：JSW Group has a won a bid to secure two copper mining blocks in the eastern Indian state of Jharkhand from state-owned Hindustan Copper Ltd., expanding its business into mining of non-ferrous metals.】

item.title: 印度顶级交易商将扩大薪酬领先香港和新加坡的优势
item.description: 受亚洲第三大经济体交易市场火热的推动，印度投资银行家今年的加薪幅度将再次高于香港和新加坡的同行。【原文：Investment bankers in India are set to again earn higher salary hikes this year versus their counterparts in Hong Kong and Singapore, boosted by a hot market for deal-making in Asia’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 中国人民银行使用新工具注入创纪录流动性，推迟下调存款准备金率
item.description: 中国央行在 1 月份通过一种新工具向金融体系注入了创纪录的大量现金，由于要优先稳定人民币汇率，央行推迟了更引人注目的宽松政策。【原文：China’s central bank injected a record amount of cash into the financial system via a new tool in January, delaying more high-profile policy easing as it prioritizes stabilizing the yuan.】

item.title: 创纪录的 S&P 500 Spunk 接下来接受 Fed Clues 和 Magnificent 7 的测试
item.description: 2025 年初市场萎靡不振，如今多头重返华尔街，推动美股重上新高。这种风险热情是否会持续，取决于本周的走势。【原文：After a malaise enveloped markets at the start 2025, the return of bulls to Wall Street has driven US stocks back to fresh highs. Whether that risk-on enthusiasm will continue comes down to what happens this week.】

item.title: 大西洋风暴触发西班牙和法国红色天气警报
item.description: 周一，"赫米妮亚 "风暴带来的 12 米（39 英尺）巨浪袭击海岸，西班牙西北部进入红色警戒状态，而法国的 Ile-et-Vilaine 省则面临红色洪水预警。【原文：Spain’s northwest is on red alert as 12 meter (39 feet) waves from Storm Herminia batter the coast on Monday, while the French department of Ile-et-Vilaine faces a red flood warning.】

item.title: 华尔街期权专家在关键盈利周前保持冷静
item.description: 期权交易商在本季度最重要的一周财报前保持冷静。【原文：Options traders are keeping calm ahead of this quarter’s biggest week of earnings.】

item.title: 菲律宾财富基金将投资中国支持的电网运营商
item.description: 菲律宾主权财富基金将收购 Synergy Grid & Development Phils.Inc.的 20% 股份，从而使政府在这家由中国支持的电网运营商的管理中拥有发言权。【原文：The Philippines’ sovereign wealth fund will acquire a 20% stake Synergy Grid & Development Phils. Inc., giving the government a say in the management of the China-backed grid operator.】

item.title: 科技风险助推避险买盘，美国收益率跌至三周低点
item.description: 在科技股推动股市暴跌之后，投资者纷纷涌向安全资产，美国国债周一反弹。【原文：US Treasuries rallied on Monday as investors flocked to safe assets after technology shares drove a slump in equity markets.】

item.title: 特朗普对哥伦比亚征收关税的威胁显示供应风险，阿拉比卡产量增加
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡期货升至新纪录，此前美国对哥伦比亚短暂的关税威胁增加了贸易的不确定性，市场正努力应对全球供应紧张的局面。【原文：Arabica coffee futures rose to a fresh record after a short-lived US tariff threat against Colombia added to trade uncertainties in a market grappling with tight global supplies.】

item.title: ASML 财报决定欧洲本周反弹的成败
item.description: 随着欧洲股市从历史最高点跌落，本周包括 ASML Holding NV 在内的一系列行业风向标公司的企业财报将重振涨势。【原文：As European stocks stumble from an all-time peak, the stakes are high for corporate earnings from a slate of industry bellwethers including ASML Holding NV this week to revive the rally.】

item.title: 巴克莱称法国动荡给法国兴业银行带来的风险正在减弱
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的一位分析师表示，法国政局动荡对该国贷款机构造成的冲击已有所缓解，对法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）的不利影响有限。【原文：The French political turmoil that hit lenders in the country has eased enough to represent a more limited headwind for Societe Generale SA, according to a Barclays Plc analyst.】

item.title: Diversified Energy 收购 Maverick 以扩大美国石油资产基础
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将提高石油产量作为一项重要任务之际，多元化能源公司（Diversified Energy Company Plc）同意收购总部位于得克萨斯州的能源生产商马弗里克自然资源公司（Maverick Natural Resources），以扩大其规模。【原文：Diversified Energy Company Plc agreed to acquire Texas-based energy producer Maverick Natural Resources to expand its scale as US President Donald Trump makes higher oil production a key priority.】

item.title: 德国大选前企业预期下滑
item.description: 今年年初，德国企业出人意料地变得更加悲观，这使得人们在下月举行的大选前更加怀疑德国能否迅速恢复增长。【原文：German companies unexpectedly became more pessimistic at the start of the year, adding to doubts before a snap election taking place next month that the country can quickly return to growth.】

item.title: 奇货可居：霍华德-马克斯如何发现市场泡沫（播客）

item.title: IEEFA 称意大利天然气需求下降面临资产搁浅风险
item.description: 一项研究显示，尽管需求下滑，意大利仍在推动建设新的液化天然气终端，这有可能造成基础设施冗余。【原文：Italy’s push to build new liquefied natural gas terminals despite sliding demand risks creating redundant infrastructure, according to a study.】
